Interface ProfileDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface ProfileDAO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Profile getProfile()
      Read an instance of Profile in the database, the last stored one.

    • Method Detail

      • saveProfile

        void saveProfile(Profile profile)
          throws DAOException
        Store an instance of Profile inside a database
        Parameters:
        profile - that is going to be store in the database
        Throws:
        DAOException - is generated when an error occurs during the storage in the database.

      • getProfile

        Profile getProfile()
            throws DAOException
        Read an instance of Profile in the database, the last stored one.
        Returns:
        Profile the last instance that has been stored in the database.
        Throws:
        DAOException - is generated when an error occurs during the reading in the database.

      • getProfiles

        java.util.List<Profile> getProfiles()
                             throws DAOException
        Read all instances of Profile in the database
        Returns:
        the list of profile that have been store in the database.
        Throws:
        DAOException - is generated when an error occurs during the reading in the database.
